p: Because of the acquired ability of EV71-VP1 97R167G to bind HS, its sensitivity to iota-carrageenan (ı-carrageenan), a highly sulfated polysaccharide, was investigated and compared to the sensitivity of EV71-VP1 97L167E in Vero and 2D neural cultures. As expected, EV71-VP1 97R167G infection was strongly inhibited by ı-carrageenan in Vero cells (IC 50 = 17.8 μg/ml), whereas EV71-VP1 97L167E infection was only slightly affected by the treatment (IC 50>200 μg/ml) ( Fig 7A). Similar results were obtained in neural cultures, where the infection of EV71-VP1 97R167G and EV71-VP1 97R/L167G/E was inhibited up to 90% in a dose-dependent manner. EV71-VP1 97L167E infectivity was also inhibited but to a lesser extent (up to 50%). Treatment of the mixed viral population altered the dominant sequence from EV71-VP1 97R167G at 1 dpi towards EV71-VP1 97R/L167G/E ( Fig 7B).
